data: There is no country in the world whose scenery is more sweetly diversified, or more delicately shaded away into that exquisite variety of surface which presents us with those wavy outlines of beauty that softly melt into each other, than is that of our own green island.

Lha Dhu; Or, The Dark Day
The Works of William Carleton, Volume Two
